message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. I'm willing to offer you the product for $1400000. This is a competitive price considering its worth to you is $1200000.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal.
